whole_object: This room's so well-dressed, even the table gets to wear a quilted skirt—guess it's not quite ready to table the notion of being fashionable!
single_object:
- Books: I'm reading a book on anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
- Lamp: I switched my lamp on today, but it just couldn't see the light of day.
- Flowers: I bought some flowers to cheer myself up, but they just said, "Aloe there," and now we're best buds.
- Picture frame: I had a photo framed, but it got sentenced to life on the wall.
- Chair: My chair was into politics, but it just couldn't stand up for itself.
- Table: The table is currently on a diet, it just can't hold as much as it used to.
- Quilt: The quilt seemed chilly, so it decided to cover up its emotions.
multi_object:
- Books  
- Lamp  
- "These books are so bright, they could outshine that lamp if they had a light reading!"

- Lamp  
- Flowers  
- "This lamp is feeling a bit dim; maybe it needs some flower power to brighten its day!"

- Flowers  
- Picture frame  
- "These flowers are so stunning, they could frame themselves better than that picture frame ever could!"

- Picture frame  
- Quilt  
- "That picture frame is jealous of the quilt; it wishes it could wrap up memories as snugly!"

- Chair  
- Table  
- "This chair is tired of being sat on; it wants to take a break at the table and have a seat at the discussion!"

- Table  
- Books  
- "This table is tired of holding books; it wants to turn the pages and join the story!" 

- Quilt  
- Flowers  
- "This quilt is so cozy, it could make even the flowers feel like they need a nap!"
